content: the elio rug is sure to bring some sunshine into your home this crochet rug pattern features a unique half circle design and uses tapestry crochet technique it is worked with double stranded yarn to create a thick and sturdy rug that will be enjoyed for years to come pattern is written in us terms materials 368 yards 2 skeins of lion brand 24/7 cotton in camel 358 yards 2 skeins of lion brand 24/7 cotton in ecru crochet hook size f 3 75mm tapestry needle scissors tape measure size finished rug is approx 16 tall x 32 wide the elio rug is also available as a kit from lion brand yarn 1 1 https //shrsl com/45ayl
